title: Search Functionality Rebuild
description: This is the first professional React project that I ever worked on. I built a small React app to handle the search functionality for scientific articles. Features included a search bar, various search filters, result cards, and pagination. In addition to building the application, we used a component based approached that adhered to thier existing design system structure.
deliverables: Frontend search functionality for scientific articles including filters, sorting, and pagination
Component based approach with documentation in Pattern Lab
